featured.text: This is because many breakthroughs come up when people venture 20 their usual routines or areas of expertise.

definition.zh_def: 專業知識或技能，通常在某一特定領域內的深厚理解和能力。
definition.en_def: Expert knowledge or skill in a particular area.
definition.example: Her expertise in computer programming helped the team complete the project ahead of schedule.
